Translations.Text: They intend to put out the light of God with their mouths, but God will not allow anything except that His light should be perfected, though the disbelievers dislike
He it is who sent His messenger with guidance and the true religion (Islam) that He may make it prevail over all religions though the polytheists may dislike

O you who believe ! many of the priests and the monks certainly swallow the wealth of people wrongfully and turn (them) away from the way of God; and those who hoard gold and silver and do not spend it in the way of God, convey to them the news of a painful punishment

on the day it will be heated up in the fire of hell, then their foreheads and their sides and their backs will be branded with it. (It will be said to them), "This is what you hoarded for yourselves so taste (the punishment of) that which you hoarded

The number of months with God is certainly twelve months (in a year) in the ordinance of God (since) the day He created the skies and the earth, of them four are sacred (during which fighting is prohibited). That is the established law, so do not be unjust to yourselves concerning them. And fight the polytheists all together as they fight with you all together and know that God is certainly with those who guard (against evil)
